name: The Time My Owner Got Raided By Eldritch Gods!
name_original: The Time My Owner Got Raided By Eldritch Gods!
description:
Oh, my dumb human. Don't you know its dangerous to walk around at night?
Protect your sleepwalking, human, Greg, from the eldritch gods raiding your home! Good thing you have 9 lives to spare. Dying makes you a bit stronger and a bit faster, so hopefully morning comes before you run out of lives.

A game made for DevelUP's April 2022 Game Jam.

Credits
2D Art - Chelsea Que, Zach Romualdez, Russell Untivero
3D Art - Russell Untivero
Programming - ctathkren Arroyo, Diego Montenejo
Fonts: Quaver by Caffinate, Sanguis by Jupiter Hadley
Audio: "Cat, Screaming, A" by InspectorJ
Other SFX & BGM taken from freesound.org
